Name: Newton's Cradle Puzzle Game
About the game: Newton's Cradle Puzzle Game is a minimalistic, relaxing & challenging puzzle game. The goal is to finish all balls. Almost no instructions are given, so you have to do the thinking yourself. There are 32 levels and 8 jazzy-like songs in the background.
